resources.string: Im ready to go for the next level
You have not enough scored to go for the next Level
After clicking the “Click Here to Start the Game” button you will be displayed some set of random numbers according to the level you are in.
Then you have to enter those numbers that you were shown, correctly in correct order
Number of correct answers and speed of giving inputs will consider on score generation process.
If you could score more than the expected level, you can go for the next game level.
If not, you have to play the current level again until you score enough to go for the next level.
